price: 8. Waxaana ka yeeli dhammaan waxa   korkeeda ah (arlada markay dunidu dhammaato) ban gabiib ah oo engagan.
arabic: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā lajāʿilūna mā ʿalayhā ṣaʿīdan juruzan
